text:
落日幽巌下　
寒泉木葉沈　
澄然明似鑑　
照見古人心
Setting sun beneath a hidden cliff;
Cold spring, where leaves are sinking.
Crystalline, as clear as a mirror;
Here are reflected the hearts of the ancients.
title: Landscape with Autumn Scenery
